CMK encryption is disabled on the Backup Vault. User can not set this state once Encryption State is 'Enabled'.

storageClassName.description: Selected storage class name for restore operation

KubernetesClusterRestoreCriteria.description: kubernetes Cluster Backup target info for restore operation

includeClusterScopeResources.description: Gets or sets the include cluster resources property. This property if enabled will include cluster scope resources during restore.

includedNamespaces.description: Gets or sets the include namespaces property. This property sets the namespaces to be included during restore.

excludedNamespaces.description: Gets or sets the exclude namespaces property. This property sets the namespaces to be excluded during restore.

includedResourceTypes.description: Gets or sets the include resource types property. This property sets the resource types to be included during restore.

excludedResourceTypes.description: Gets or sets the exclude resource types property. This property sets the resource types to be excluded during restore.

labelSelectors.description: Gets or sets the LabelSelectors property. This property sets the resource with such label selectors to be included during restore.

persistentVolumeRestoreMode.description: Gets or sets the PV (Persistent Volume) Restore Mode property. This property sets whether volumes needs to be restored.

conflictPolicy.description: Gets or sets the Conflict Policy property. This property sets policy during conflict of resources during restore.

namespaceMappings.description: Gets or sets the Namespace Mappings property. This property sets if namespace needs to be change during restore.

restoreHookReferences.description: Gets or sets the restore hook references. This property sets the hook reference to be executed during restore.

RehydrationPriority.description: Priority to be used for rehydration. Values High or Standard

RestoreFilesTargetInfo.description: Class encapsulating restore as files target parameters

targetDetails.description: Destination of RestoreAsFiles operation, when destination is not a datasource

datasourceAuthCredentials.description: Credentials to use to authenticate with data source provider.

RestoreTargetInfoBase.description: Base class common to RestoreTargetInfo and RestoreFilesTargetInfo

objectType.description: Type of Datasource object, used to initialize the right inherited type

ResourceMoveDetails.description: ResourceMoveDetails will be returned in response to GetResource call from ARM

operationId.description: CorrelationId of latest ResourceMove operation attempted

startTimeUtc.description: Start time in UTC of latest ResourceMove operation attempted. ISO 8601 format.

completionTimeUtc.description: Completion time in UTC of latest ResourceMove operation attempted. ISO 8601 format.

sourceResourcePath.description: ARM resource path of source resource

targetResourcePath.description: ARM resource path of target resource used in latest ResourceMove operation

startTime.description: Start time for the available restore range

endTime.description: End time for the available restore range

tagName.description: Retention Tag Name to relate it to retention rule.

absoluteCriteria.description:
it contains absolute values like "AllBackup" / "FirstOfDay" / "FirstOfWeek" / "FirstOfMonth"
and should be part of AbsoluteMarker enum

daysOfMonth.description: This is day of the month from 1 to 28 other wise last of month

scheduleTimes.description: List of schedule times for backup

taggingCriteria.description: List of tags that can be applicable for given schedule.

SecretStoreResource.description: Class representing a secret store resource.

uri.description: Uri to get to the resource

secretStoreType.description: Gets or sets the type of secret store

value.description: Gets or sets value stored in secret store resource

SecuritySettings.description: Class containing security settings of vault

values.description: Soft Delete is turned off for the BackupVault
Soft Delete is enabled for the BackupVault but can be turned off
Soft Delete is permanently enabled for the BackupVault and the setting cannot be changed

datastoreType.description: Gets or sets the type of the datastore.

syncType.description: Field indicating sync type e.g. to sync only in case of failure or in all cases

criteria.description: Criteria which decides whether the tag can be applied to a triggered backup.

copyAfter.description: It can be CustomCopyOption or ImmediateCopyOption.

TargetDetails.description: Class encapsulating target details, used where the destination is not a datasource

filePrefix.description:
Restore operation may create multiple files inside location pointed by Url
Below will be the common prefix for all of them

restoreTargetLocationType.description:
Denotes the target location where the data will be restored,
string value for the enum {Microsoft.Internal.AzureBackup.DataProtection.Common.Interface.RestoreTargetLocationType}

url.description: Url denoting the restore destination. It can point to container / file share etc

targetResourceArmId.description:
Full ARM Id denoting the restore destination. It is the ARM Id pointing to container / file share
This is optional if the target subscription can be identified with the URL field. If not
then this is needed if CrossSubscriptionRestore field of BackupVault is in any of the disabled states

backupRuleOptions.description: Name for the Rule of the Policy which needs to be applied for this backup

objectType.description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

UserFacingError.description: Error object used by layers that have access to localized content, and propagate that to user

isRetryable.description: Whether the operation will be retryable or not

isUserError.description: Whether the operation is due to a user error or service error

properties.description: Any key value pairs that can be injected inside error object

restoreRequestObject.description: Gets or sets the restore request object.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the BackupVault resource

allowAutoApprovals.description: This flag indicates whether auto approval is allowed or not.

resourceGuardOperations.description: {readonly} List of operation details those are protected by the ResourceGuard resource

vaultCriticalOperationExclusionList.description: List of critical operations which are not protected by this resourceGuard

description.description: Description about the pre-req steps to perform all the critical operations.

ResourceGuardOperation.description: This class contains all the details about a critical operation.

ResourceGuardOperationDetail.description: VaultCritical Operation protected by a resource guard

ResourceGuardProxyBaseResource.description: ResourceGuardProxyBaseResource object, used for response and request bodies for ResourceGuardProxy APIs

UnlockDeleteRequest.description: Request body of unlock delete API.

unlockDeleteExpiryTime.description: This is the time when unlock delete privileges will get expired.

VaultName.name: vaultName
VaultName.description: The name of the backup vault.

BackupInstanceName.name: backupInstanceName
BackupInstanceName.description: The name of the backup instance.

ResourceId.name: resourceId
ResourceId.description: ARM path of the resource to be protected using Microsoft.DataProtection
